summary: Geophysical Data Manager with 35 years of experience in Shell upstream. Original started as a programmer/developer and via system engineering moved into Subsurface Data Management with the emphasis on Seismic Data. Very service minded attitude. Good understanding of various types of Geophysical, Geological and Petrophysical data. Good understanding of project (user controlled) and corporate (data management controlled) data. Not driven by money, willing to help/assist with subsurface data management issues, showing that good Data Management will help the technical professionals to do a better job and will save a company time and money.
